

{{html:
<div id="container">
<div id="content">
<div class="contents">
<div id="main">
<header>
<span class='icon'></span>

<h1>Buckets</h1>
<a href="/$$space/buckets/new" class="button">Create Bucket</a>

</header>

<table class='droplets'>
<thead>
  <tr>
  <th class='image'>Image</th>
  <th class='name'>Name</th>
  <th class='ip'>IP Address</th>
  <th class='status'>Status</th>
  <th class='memory'>Memory</th>
  <th class='disk'>Disk</th>
  <th class='region'>Region</th>
  </tr>
</thead>
<tbody data-bind="foreach: buckets">
  <tr>
    <td class='image' data-bind="text: imageName">
    </td>
    <td class='name' data-bind="title: name">
     <a href="/buckets/341045" data-bind="text: name, attr: {href: bucketUrl}">bala7</a>
    </td>
    <td class='ip' data-bind="text: ip">
    </td>
    <td class='active status' data-bind="text: status">
    Active
    </td>
    <td class='memory' data-bind="text: memory">
    </td>
    <td class='disk' data-bind="text: disk">
    </td>
    <td class='region' data-bind="text: region">
    </td>
  </tr>
</tbody>
</table>

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

}}
